price: ហើយពួកគេនិយាយថាៈ តើការកាត់សេចក្ដីនេះ(ថ្ងៃបរលោក)នឹងមកដល់នៅពេលណា ប្រសិនបើពួកអ្នកជាអ្នកនិយាយ ពិតនោះ?
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡفَتۡحُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-fatḥu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
